ygData.subject: RE: SORRY!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: I second - send more bard stories! Sylly Songsynger Bard of the 22st song Selling Swords and Such somewhere on Innoruuk p.s. Roken - this is what I do - punch
ygData.messageBody:
I second - send more bard stories!

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 22st song
Selling Swords and Such
somewhere on Innoruuk

p.s. Roken - this is what I do - punch a decay skelly and then let him
follow me around and I pretend like I got a pet :-) (waiting for the lev
when we do get real pets - ok ok not real pets but short term charms).
Eventually, someone helpful kills him off and I axe - why did u kill my
pet??? <hehe>


-----Original Message-----
From: Rokenn Swiftsong [mailto:rokenn@...]
Sent: Monday, August 23, 1999 9:26 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] SORRY!!!!

From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>

I agree, I enjoyed the story as well. Especially that last
line about
worrying about outrunning a skeleton, hehe.

Rokenn Swiftsong
(Who still can't understand why 4th lvl skeles still chase
him at 29th)
